templates.title: Planka v2
templates.name: planka-v2
templates.description: The realtime kanban board for workgroups built with React and Redux.
templates.note: Free open source kanban board for workgroups.

env.name: BASE_URL
env.label: BASE_URL
env.description: The base URL where Planka will be accessed (required)

env.name: SECRET_KEY
env.label: SECRET_KEY
env.description: Secret key for session encryption - CHANGE THIS IN PRODUCTION (required)

env.name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_EMAIL
env.label: DEFAULT_ADMIN_EMAIL
env.description: Default admin email for initial setup (required)

env.name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.label: DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.description: Default admin password for initial setup (required)

env.name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_NAME
env.label: DEFAULT_ADMIN_NAME
env.description: Default admin full name for initial setup (required)

env.name: DEFAULT_ADMIN_USERNAME
env.label: DEFAULT_ADMIN_USERNAME
env.description: Default admin username for initial setup (required)

env.name: TRUST_PROXY
env.label: TRUST_PROXY
env.description: v2.0.0: Set to 'true' if behind reverse proxy (uses boolean strings, not numeric)

env.name: MAX_UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE
env.label: MAX_UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE
env.description: v2.0.0: Maximum file upload size in bytes (default: 100MB)

env.name: STORAGE_LIMIT
env.label: STORAGE_LIMIT
env.description: v2.0.0: Total storage limit in bytes (0 = unlimited)

env.name: OUTGOING_BLOCKED_HOSTS
env.label: OUTGOING_BLOCKED_HOSTS
env.description: v2.0.0: Comma-separated list of hosts to block for SSRF protection (e.g., localhost,postgres)

env.name: OUTGOING_PROXY
env.label: OUTGOING_PROXY
env.description: v2.0.0: HTTP proxy for outgoing requests (optional)

env.name: OUTGOING_PROXY_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED
env.label: OUTGOING_PROXY_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED
env.description: v2.0.0: Reject unauthorized TLS certificates for proxy (optional)
